channel.title: Donation System
channel.description:
Hello i am fairly new to html codeing and all that. I have admined on other servers and i know it is possible to do this :)
I need help making an automatic donation system. I do not know the first place to start in makeing it so as soon as a player pays they get automatic donator status and maybe items that i throw in. I am working on the site at the moment and before i make a tab for donations i want to know if someone can help me create the system.
Thankyou for any help on this topic.

item.title: Donation System
item.dc:creator: @King_Zeus King Zeus
item.description:
@King_Zeus wrote:

Thankyou i would really like it if someone could show me a tut on how to get a donation system working. I am FAIRLY new to codeing and i just need some help with the donation system. Other then that everything is straight forward. Thankyou to everyone helping

When the tutorial does come out i will put credits on my website for you too

Read full topic

item.title: Donation System
item.dc:creator: @Bakpao Bakpao
item.description:
@Bakpao wrote:

MySQL and PHP allow you to write inside .txt folders from outside your source like a website.
So far there are not many working tutorials on this, but my team is developing this.

Read full topic

item.title: Donation System
item.dc:creator: @King_Zeus King Zeus
item.description:
@King_Zeus wrote:

Ok thanks im going to google it now but im not finding anything

The mysql makes it so when someone donates it will automaticly give them donator rights and whatever item i set it to? Or a random item because thats what im looking to do… Any more assistance on this i would most greatly LOVE you for.

Thankyou guys for the help i knew moparscape was the place to ask this question i love you guys

Read full topic

item.title: Donation System
item.dc:creator: @GabberDaan GabberDaan
item.description:
@GabberDaan wrote:

well you need:
-a server that uses mysql for the ingame privelages…
-not only HTML (its only the clientside of a website) but also php
-and ofc a mysql server

but i think there are enough tuts everywhere… gl m8

Read full topic
